main_definition: To cease an action or movement, or to come to a halt.

meanings_and_examples.definition: No longer continuing with an activity
meanings_and_examples.example: After running for 20 minutes, she stopped jogging and walked home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: End of a journey or travel
meanings_and_examples.example: The bus stopped at the station as it was reaching its final destination.
When I plugged in my computer, I realized that it had stopped working due to a power outage.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Terminate employment from a job position
meanings_and_examples.example: He was unexpectedly stopped at his desk by his boss and informed about his immediate termination.
